body:
This stout staff is made of ash. Four faces of animals—a bear, a falcon, a stag, and a wolf—are carved at its top. The aspect staff functions as a +1/+1 quarterstaff and allows the use of the following spells:

  • Aspect of the bear (1 charge)
  • Aspect of the falcon (1 charge)
  • Aspect of the stag (2 charges)
  • Aspect of the wolf (3 charges)
name: Staff of Aspects
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Aspects
